title: Drawing, "Portion of a Mountainous Panorama, Possibly Jamaica", possibly 1865
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top:  3 - B - trees gradually changing into / Bushes  plants and grass at the top; at center: rock ; and again at bottom left: 3
description: Vertical rectangle showing a sloping hillside, wih a valley on the left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Portion of a Mountainous Panorama, Possibly Jamaica", possibly 1865.
possibly 1865. Graphite on cream-colored paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1529.
